title: We need to stop asking for an "unattractive" female champion and this is why
body:
Riot was going down the right path when they made Reksai. They wanted to make a champion that is technically female, even though it could easily be retconned to a male with literally no effort, to pander to the people who think that every woman in League is an hourglass with tits.

They just didn't want to do it in a way that would disgust people (like a witch or a hag, etc.)

They made a female creature, not a woman that feels bad about looking in the mirror. Because no woman should have to feel that way, and Riot knows that.

So just fucking stop asking for an "ugly" female champion already. You have no clue what you're trying to do. You've already gotten what you want with Reksai, and even more.

So just stop.
